title: Sikyon Excavation Project Fund
description: To provide support for the Sikyon Excavation Project in the Classics Department at CU Boulder.  Support includes supplies, storage facilities, equipment, housing for staff and students and other project-related expenses.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Sikyon Excavation Project in the Classics Department at CU Boulder. Support includes supplies, storage facilities, equipment, housing for staff and students and other project-related expenses.
